attributes.action: Regulate the use of chlorofluorocarbons (CFCs) and N2O
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please:
1) Ban using haloalkanes and N2O for purposes other than medicinal
2) Ban using CFCs other than haloalkanes, as they are not even suitable for medical purposes
These gases are warming our planet and destroying the ozone layer, therefore threatening our health. Please therefore make relevant law, and propose an identical international treaty for other governments to sign.
